oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elm Farm Research Centre
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The instituteâ€™s research covers a wide spectrum of work from on farm trials to factorial and laboratory work. The content of the work ranges from crop and animal agronomy (particularly cereals and poultry) as well as animal health and welfare. Environmental work includes work on farmed and non-farmed areas as well as soil and water. Policy research is undertaken in the areas of sustainability and organic standards as well as GM, food quality and energy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Organization} EFRC: Elm Farm Research Centre. Organization Leader(s): Woodward, Mr Lawrence.
